message.content: {"given_definition_quality":40,"better_definition":"Beijing, the capital city of China.","sentence":"我在北京。","image_prompt":"Soft apocalypse animation style. A person standing in front of a cityscape with the iconic Beijing skyline, including the CCTV tower and the Temple of Heaven visible in the background. There are some subtle signs of overgrowth and nature reclaiming parts of the buildings. The sky is hazy. The mood is gentle, not threatening. \"Beijing\" should be subtly incorporated as Chinese characters somewhere in the background.","sentence_translation":"I am in Beijing."}
